q: Meanwhile former News of the World journalist Paul McMullan told MPs that he believed Andy Coulson , the former No 10 director of communications who quit over the scandal last month, must have known about phone-hacking. The real scandal is Cameron would have been briefed:` We can probably get away with this one,' when hiring Andy Coulson , so Mr Cameron is either a liar or an idiot, he wrote. "Idol" became must-watch TV not just because of Simon Cowell 's snark, but because of how he interacted with the other judges, particularly Paula Abdul . When she left, the show lost something.
